trans-unit.source: Deploy a SharePoint Server 2013 farm | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Deploy a SharePoint Server 2013 farm | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Deploy a high-availability SharePoint Server 2013 farm using SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups in Azure in five phases.
trans-unit.target: Deploy a high-availability SharePoint Server 2013 farm using SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups in Azure in five phases.

trans-unit.source: Deploying SharePoint with SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups in Azure
trans-unit.target: Deploying SharePoint with SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups in Azure

trans-unit.source: This topic contains links to the step-by-step instructions for deploying an intranet-only SharePoint 2013 farm with SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups with Azure Service Management.
trans-unit.target: This topic contains links to the step-by-step instructions for deploying an intranet-only SharePoint 2013 farm with SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups with Azure Service Management.

trans-unit.source: The farm contains these computers:
trans-unit.target: The farm contains these computers:

trans-unit.source: Two SharePoint web servers
trans-unit.target: Two SharePoint web servers

trans-unit.source: Two SharePoint application servers
trans-unit.target: Two SharePoint application servers

trans-unit.source: Two database servers
trans-unit.target: Two database servers

trans-unit.source: One cluster majority node server
trans-unit.target: One cluster majority node server

trans-unit.source: Two domain controllers
trans-unit.target: Two domain controllers

trans-unit.source: This is the configuration, with placeholder names for each server:
trans-unit.target: This is the configuration, with placeholder names for each server:

trans-unit.source: Two machines for each role ensure high availability.
trans-unit.target: Two machines for each role ensure high availability.

trans-unit.source: All of the virtual machines are in a single region.
trans-unit.target: All of the virtual machines are in a single region.

trans-unit.source: Each group of virtual machines for a specific role is in its own availability set.
trans-unit.target: Each group of virtual machines for a specific role is in its own availability set.

trans-unit.source: You deploy this configuration in the following phases:
trans-unit.target: You deploy this configuration in the following phases:

trans-unit.source: [Phase 1: Configure Azure](virtual-machines-workload-intranet-sharepoint-phase1.md).
trans-unit.target: [Phase 1: Configure Azure](virtual-machines-workload-intranet-sharepoint-phase1.md).

trans-unit.source: Create a storage account, cloud services, and a cross-premises virtual network.
trans-unit.target: Create a storage account, cloud services, and a cross-premises virtual network.

trans-unit.source: [Phase 2: Configure domain controllers](virtual-machines-workload-intranet-sharepoint-phase2.md).
trans-unit.target: [Phase 2: Configure domain controllers](virtual-machines-workload-intranet-sharepoint-phase2.md).

trans-unit.source: Create and configure replica Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) domain controllers.
trans-unit.target: Create and configure replica Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) domain controllers.

trans-unit.source: [Phase 3: Configure SQL Server infrastructure](virtual-machines-workload-intranet-sharepoint-phase3.md).
trans-unit.target: [Phase 3: Configure SQL Server infrastructure](virtual-machines-workload-intranet-sharepoint-phase3.md).

trans-unit.source: Create and configure the SQL Server virtual machines, prepare them for use with SharePoint, and create the cluster.
trans-unit.target: Create and configure the SQL Server virtual machines, prepare them for use with SharePoint, and create the cluster.

trans-unit.source: [Phase 4: Configure SharePoint servers](virtual-machines-workload-intranet-sharepoint-phase4.md).
trans-unit.target: [Phase 4: Configure SharePoint servers](virtual-machines-workload-intranet-sharepoint-phase4.md).

trans-unit.source: Create and configure the four SharePoint virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: Create and configure the four SharePoint virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: [Phase 5: Create the availability group and add the SharePoint databases](virtual-machines-workload-intranet-sharepoint-phase5.md).
trans-unit.target: [Phase 5: Create the availability group and add the SharePoint databases](virtual-machines-workload-intranet-sharepoint-phase5.md).

trans-unit.source: Prepare databases and create a SQL Server AlwaysOn availability group.
trans-unit.target: Prepare databases and create a SQL Server AlwaysOn availability group.

trans-unit.source: This deployment of SharePoint with SQL Server AlwaysOn is designed to accompany the [SharePoint with SQL Server AlwaysOn infographic](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=394788) and incorporate the latest recommendations.
trans-unit.target: This deployment of SharePoint with SQL Server AlwaysOn is designed to accompany the [SharePoint with SQL Server AlwaysOn infographic](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=394788) and incorporate the latest recommendations.

trans-unit.source: This configuration is a prescriptive, phase-by-phase guide for a predefined architecture to create a functional, highly available intranet SharePoint farm in Azure infrastructure services.
trans-unit.target: This configuration is a prescriptive, phase-by-phase guide for a predefined architecture to create a functional, highly available intranet SharePoint farm in Azure infrastructure services.

trans-unit.source: For additional architectural guidance on implementing SharePoint 2013 in Azure, see [Microsoft Azure architectures for SharePoint 2013](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/dn635309.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For additional architectural guidance on implementing SharePoint 2013 in Azure, see [Microsoft Azure architectures for SharePoint 2013](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/dn635309.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Keep the following in mind:
trans-unit.target: Keep the following in mind:

trans-unit.source: If you are an experienced SharePoint implementer, please feel free to adapt the instructions in phases 3 through 5 and build the farm that best suits your needs.
trans-unit.target: If you are an experienced SharePoint implementer, please feel free to adapt the instructions in phases 3 through 5 and build the farm that best suits your needs.

trans-unit.source: If you already have an existing Azure hybrid cloud implementation, feel free to adapt or skip the instructions in phases 1 and 2 to host the new SharePoint farm on the appropriate subnet.
trans-unit.target: If you already have an existing Azure hybrid cloud implementation, feel free to adapt or skip the instructions in phases 1 and 2 to host the new SharePoint farm on the appropriate subnet.

trans-unit.source: All of the servers are located on a single subnet in the Azure virtual network.
trans-unit.target: All of the servers are located on a single subnet in the Azure virtual network.

trans-unit.source: If you want to provide additional security equivalent to subnet isolation, you can use [network security groups](virtual-networks-nsg.md).
trans-unit.target: If you want to provide additional security equivalent to subnet isolation, you can use [network security groups](virtual-networks-nsg.md).

trans-unit.source: To build a dev/test environment or a proof-of-concept of this configuration, see [Set up a SharePoint intranet farm in a hybrid cloud for testing](../virtual-network/virtual-networks-setup-sharepoint-hybrid-cloud-testing.md).
trans-unit.target: To build a dev/test environment or a proof-of-concept of this configuration, see [Set up a SharePoint intranet farm in a hybrid cloud for testing](../virtual-network/virtual-networks-setup-sharepoint-hybrid-cloud-testing.md).

trans-unit.source: For additional information about SharePoint with SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups, see [Configure SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Availability Groups for SharePoint 2013](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/jj715261.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For additional information about SharePoint with SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups, see [Configure SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Availability Groups for SharePoint 2013](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/jj715261.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Next step
trans-unit.target: Next step

trans-unit.source: To start the configuration of this workload, go to [Phase 1: Configure Azure](virtual-machines-workload-intranet-sharepoint-phase1.md).
trans-unit.target: To start the configuration of this workload, go to [Phase 1: Configure Azure](virtual-machines-workload-intranet-sharepoint-phase1.md).

trans-unit.target: Additional resources
